title: 399 Breasts: The Ultimate Boobs Photo Collection

Naked, nude, no clothes! Nipples everywhere. This book will make you want to give a pearl necklace! Each page is 5.5 inches wide by 8.5 inches tall, two pictures on each page...
author: Keyser B. Soze
